title: Secretly Loving You
overview: Heiress He Lingfei, who once lived extravagantly, abruptly severed ties with her college boyfriend after her family went bankrupt. Unbeknownst to her, Lu Yichen was actually an abandoned heir of a wealthy family. After being cast out, he clawed his way back and transformed into a cold-hearted CEO. Years later, they reunite at a banquet where He Lingfei, now a fallen heiress, is busy serving her fianc√©. Lu Yichen's eyes blaze with love and resentment: When you left me without a word back then, did you ever think about the man you discarded?
